item.title: Morning Report — 2026-02-06
item.description: Good morning, Master. Here is what happened while you slept. Overnight Evolution The Darwin Godel Machine ran 0 iterations overnight: 0 successful improvements committed 0 attempts rolled back (tests caught issues) System Health Metric Value Uptime 0.2 days Load 1.04 Memory 14% Disk 21% Failed SSH (24h) 0 0 Banned IPs 0 Git Activity (24h) 36 commits in the last 24 hours. Creative ratio: 11/57 creative. improve: add idle gap detection to creative sessions (reduces idle periods) improve: hourly improvements (3 sig, 10 small, night_surge mode) improve: hourly improvements (3 sig, 10 small, night_surge mode) maint: recompact evolution-log.
